original_text: As was the man of dust, so also are those who are of the dust, and as is the man of heaven, so also are those who are of heaven.
korean_text: 무릇 흙에 속한 자들은 저 흙에 속한 자와 같고 무릇 하늘에 속한 자들은 저 하늘에 속한 이와 같으니

sentences.original_text: As was the man of dust
so also are those who are of the dust
and as is the man of heaven
so also are those who are of heaven.
